name: The Thoughts Room
description:
Type out your thoughts, feelings, or whatever is on your mind.  Nobody will ever see or know what you type, you get to watch your thoughts fall away and fade into the stars.

An homage to the original project which went down a year ago.  I decided to remake it myself for everyone to have once more.  Music by Marc Teichert: https://play.google.com/music/listen#/artist/Apubvil7oi44otr46b5tebshxsa/Marc+Te...

https://itunes.apple.com/ca/artist/marc-teichert/514192491
